doc.summary: Gets the world seed to be used in codecs.
doc.text: Gets the world seed to be used in codecs. Vanilla provides no way for this.

doc.summary: Provides a way to get the seed for the current world.
doc.text: Provides a way to get the seed for the current world.

properties.text:
Since 1.18.2, the world seed is initialised too late to be used in chunk generator and biome source codecs and will yield wrong results there. After
the level has been constructed, the seed is obtainable using level.getServer().getWorldData().worldGenSettings().seed() from a ServerLevel. Using this in worldgen codecs can lead to chunk errors, don't do this.
